senses.sense_definition: Relating to areas that are not part of a large city or its surrounding suburbs; often rural.

examples.text: The government announced new funding to support healthcare in <w>nonmetropolitan</w> areas.
Many people are moving to a <w>nonmetropolitan</w> county to escape the high cost of city living.

senses.sense_definition: A person who does not live in a large city or metropolitan area.

examples.text: The survey highlighted the different political priorities of metropolitans and <w>nonmetropolitans</w>.
As a <w>nonmetropolitan</w>, he found the constant noise of the city difficult to handle.
